Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
from database import db
from models import SMSCampaign, SMSTarget
from sqlalchemy import create_engine
from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker

engine = create_engine\(''sqlite:///phishvision.db''\)
Session = sessionmaker\(bind=engine\)
session = Session\(\)

campaigns = session.query\(SMSCampaign\).order_by\(SMSCampaign.created_at.desc\(\)\).limit\(5\).all\(\)

print\(''Recent SMS Campaigns:''\)
for c in campaigns:
    target_count = session.query\(SMSTarget\).filter_by\(campaign_id=c.id\).count\(\)
    print\(f''  {c.name} - Status: {c.status}, Targets: {target_count}, Created: {c.created_at}''\)

print\(''\\nAll SMS Targets:''\)
targets = session.query\(SMSTarget\).all\(\)
for t in targets:
    print\(f''  Campaign: {t.campaign_id}, Phone: {t.phone_number}, Email: {t.email}, Sent: {t.sent_at}''\)
")
